languages.text: "Команда продолжает оплакивать Леди Теодору. Боюсь, это может сказаться на эффективности их трудов во благо Лорд-капитана".
"The crew continues to mourn Lady Theodora. I fear it may affect the performance of their duties in service of the Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Команда продолжает оплакивать Леди Теодору. Боюсь, это может сказаться на эффективности их трудов во благо Лорд-капитана".

traits.locale_text: "The crew continues to mourn Lady Theodora. I fear it may affect the performance of their duties in service of the Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The crew continues to mourn Lady Theodora. I fear it may affect the performance of their duties in service of the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "The crew continues to mourn Lady Theodora. I fear it may affect the performance of their duties in service of the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "The crew continues to mourn Lady Theodora. I fear it may affect the performance of their duties in service of the Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “船员仍在哀悼西奥多拉夫人。我担心这可能会影响他们的职责，他们可能不愿为新任领主舰长服务。”
languages.original_text: "The crew continues to mourn Lady Theodora. I fear it may affect the performance of their duties in service of the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “船员仍在哀悼西奥多拉夫人。我担心这可能会影响他们的职责，他们可能不愿为新任领主舰长服务。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « L'équipage pleure encore dame Théodora. Je crains que cela ne porte préjudice à l'accomplissement de ses devoirs au service {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "The crew continues to mourn Lady Theodora. I fear it may affect the performance of their duties in service of the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « L'équipage pleure encore dame Théodora. Je crains que cela ne porte préjudice à l'accomplissement de ses devoirs au service {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Die Crew trauert noch immer um Lady Theodora. Ich fürchte, das könnte die Ausübung ihrer Pflichten in Diensten des Lord Captains beeinträchtigen."
languages.original_text: "The crew continues to mourn Lady Theodora. I fear it may affect the performance of their duties in service of the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Die Crew trauert noch immer um Lady Theodora. Ich fürchte, das könnte die Ausübung ihrer Pflichten in Diensten des Lord Captains beeinträchtigen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「クルーはレディ・シオドーラをなおも悼んでいます。ロード・キャプテンに従ってきちんと義務を果たしてくれるものか、心配です」
languages.original_text: "The crew continues to mourn Lady Theodora. I fear it may affect the performance of their duties in service of the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「クルーはレディ・シオドーラをなおも悼んでいます。ロード・キャプテンに従ってきちんと義務を果たしてくれるものか、心配です」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «La tripulación sigue llorando la muerte de lady Theodora. Me preocupa que pueda afectar al rendimiento de sus funciones al servicio de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "The crew continues to mourn Lady Theodora. I fear it may affect the performance of their duties in service of the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «La tripulación sigue llorando la muerte de lady Theodora. Me preocupa que pueda afectar al rendimiento de sus funciones al servicio de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "The crew continues to mourn Lady Theodora. I fear it may affect the performance of their duties in service of the Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Mürettebat, Leydi Theodora'nın yasını tutmaya devam ediyor. Maalesef bu durum, Lord Kaptan'a hizmetindeki vazifelerini yerine getirmelerini etkileyebilir."
languages.original_text: "The crew continues to mourn Lady Theodora. I fear it may affect the performance of their duties in service of the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Mürettebat, Leydi Theodora'nın yasını tutmaya devam ediyor. Lord Kaptan'a hizmet ederken bu durumun güçlük yaratabileceğini öngörmekteyim."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
